ComicInfo.Summary:
Roadblock and the Joe field team set out to free Inner Mongolia from the grip of the Dreadnoks and Crystal Ball's eldritch abilities, as Lady Jaye & Gung-Ho run up against a familiar enemy in Athens. Plus, a startling revelation about one of the Joe team's oldest, most revered members–one that changes absolutely everything!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | Sub-A | Artist's Edition Subscription Cover A | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Paolo Villainelli (a) & John-Paul Bove (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Brandon Graham | 4 | Note: Includes a handbook entry for Shipwreck.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 15:00:09. [CVDB587195]

ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, Decepticons, Dire Wraiths, Dreadnoks, G.I. Joe, Seekers
ComicInfo.Locations: Asia, Athens, China, Europe, Greece, Lemuria, Mongolia
